units.title: Physical Sciences — AC9S9U03 — Motion models
units.whyThis: This activity introduces Physical Sciences at a level that suits you.

units.title: Biological Sciences — AC9S8U01 — Cells and systems
units.whyThis: You’ve already learned some Biological Sciences, so this Y8 activity is the next step to extend it.

units.title: Earth & Space Sciences — AC9S8U02 — Plate tectonics
units.whyThis: You’ve already learned some Earth & Space Sciences, so this Y8 activity is the next step to extend it.

careers.title: Waste Management Technician
careers.whyThis: Waste Management Technician will help you build your Chemical Sciences and Physical Sciences from where you are now. You also need a bit more knowledge in Chemical Sciences. At your year level it’s a good time to start exploring what Waste Management Technician involves. We slightly relaxed the rules so you can see Waste Management Technician now and understand what to work towards.

careers.title: Marine Biologist
careers.whyThis: Marine Biologist uses the Biological Sciences and Earth & Space Sciences you’ve already been learning. You also need a bit more knowledge in Biological Sciences. At your year level it’s a good time to start exploring what Marine Biologist involves. We slightly relaxed the rules so you can see Marine Biologist now and understand what to work towards.

careers.title: GIS Technician
careers.whyThis: GIS Technician will help you build your Earth & Space Sciences from where you are now. You also need a bit more knowledge in Earth & Space Sciences. At your year level it’s a good time to start exploring what GIS Technician involves. We slightly relaxed the rules so you can see GIS Technician now and understand what to work towards.
